trans_title: 威尔士名屋的隐秘 第一季
introduction: 劳伦斯·卢埃林-鲍恩在威尔士访问一些较为有名的房屋，回溯时光，揭露其隐藏的故事。Laurence Llewelyn-Bowen visits some of the finest houses in Wales, stepping back in time to uncover their hidden stories. He turns his attention to Trefor Hall, a fine Georgian mansion on the outskirts of Llangollen in north east Wales. During a historical journey of discovery, Laurence finds out how Trefor Hall was saved from dereliction and transformed into a pop music mogul's personal pleasure palace.
chinese_title: 威尔士名屋的隐秘 第一季
